description: Cities take shape based on an essential activity--farming. Teacher travels around to learn about the most advanced civilizations like Egypt.

name: Episode 5
description: Wars take place and people emigrate. In 500 B.C., Darius, Cyrus‚Äôs successor, rules 20 kingdoms. There has never been such a powerful man.

name: Episode 6
description: In 438 B.C., the Parthenon in Athens is inaugurated and great wisdom sees a peak. Unfortunately, Greece becomes involved in never-ending wars.

name: Episode 7
description: In 52 B.C., Rome and Julius Caesar‚Äôs empire grow. A few decades later, a child is born who changes the calendar and begins our era at year 0.

name: Episode 8
description: After Rome‚Äôs grandeur, Constantinople follows suit. In 732, a century after Muhammad‚Äôs death, the Frankish ruler Charles Martel stops Arab expansion.

name: Episode 9
description: From Clovis, crowned in Reims as King of the Franks, to Charlemagne, who died in 814, conflicts continue with little respite.

name: Episode 10
description: The Northern men are ferocious warriors and fearless sailors. Viking ships tear through the waters of Sicily, Byzantium and even the New World.

name: Episode 11
description: The feudal system was established and a ‚Äúdog eat dog‚Äù mentality prevailed. In the 13th century, cathedrals and churches sprung up all over Europe.

name: Episode 12
description: The year is 1227. Genghis Khan hands down his vast empire to his children. Marco Polo will soon set off on an expedition that lasts 24 years.

name: Episode 13
description: Joan of Arc saves Orleans from an English siege. Charles VII is crowned king of France. The war has ravaged the land but the plague is far worse.

name: Episode 14
description: A talented young man called Leonardo da Vinci dreams of flying and changing the course of rivers. He and the king of France both die in 1519.

name: Episode 15
description: 1516. A young Charles V takes the coveted throne of Spain, the home of the Inquisition. Spanish ships travel to the New World to bring back gold.

name: Episode 16
description: In order to weaken Catholic Spain, Elizabeth I of English supports an expedition that will fill her coffers with treasures stolen from the Spanish.

name: Episode 17
description: In 1581 the Dutch Republic is established. In 1594 the East India Company is formed. Science progresses thanks to important figures.

name: Episode 18
description: In 1680 Paris has 400,000 inhabitants. The Sun King, an absolute monarch, orders the construction of the Palace of Versailles.

name: Episode 19
description: 1695. Tsar Peter the Great holds the fate of Russia in his hands. After waging several wars on the Baltic Sea, he build a new capital: St. Petersburg.

name: Episode 20
description: In the 18th century, philosophers take on a new role during the Enlightenment. Royalty, religion, and hierarchy are called into question.

name: Episode 21
description: The Mayflower sails the ocean. The natives are shocked to see white men land upon on their shores.

name: Episode 22
description: July, 1789. Paris roars from hunger. The threat of revolt takes shape and the people storm the Bastille. King Louis XVI is unable to flee.

name: Episode 23
description: 1892. Teacher goes to Liverpool to see a steam machine competition. He witnesses the beginning of railroads, which will soon cover Europe and America.

name: Episode 24
description: 1900. Dreams, atomic structures, and relativity are big topics. Paris prepares for a universal exposition and builds a subway, something unheard of.

name: Episode 25
description: Aviation has progressed so much that it plays a major role in the First World War. After this terrible conflict, the public laughs at Chaplin films.

name: Episode 26
description: 1969. Neil Armstrong walks on the moon while the world watches. What a step! Nuclear and solar energy are studied but pollution is a threat.

name: Episode 1
description: Perrine and her mother Marie prepare to travel to France to see her grandfather, as her dead father Edmond wished, earning money as photographers.

name: Episode 2
description: Marie‚Äôs unusual sari attracts attention, drawing in lots of customers. One day, the wheels of their carriage get caught in the mud and they are stuck.

name: Episode 3
description: Perrine and her mother seek shelter in a private home and help a mother near childbirth. Perrine is surprised but pleased with her mother‚Äôs deft work.

name: Episode 4
description: Perrine and her mother reach Croatia and are cornered by imperious Austrian soldiers searching for someone - the man Perrine met in the woods.

name: Episode 5
description: Their water barrel breaks on their way, but a kind old man helps repair it and gives them water too. Perrine sees her as yet unmet grandfather in him.

name: Episode 6
description: Perrine and her mother arrive in Trieste, Italy. As they rest in an inn, a policeman comes and takes them to the station. Perrine meets a noblewoman.

name: Episode 7
description: Marcel, a boy who appears before Perrine and her mother, asks them for a ride to the next town so he can follow his circus-actor parents.

name: Episode 8
description: Perrine and her mother hurry to a blacksmith to fix the carriage‚Äôs axle, but their donkey Palikare gets drunk on wine and runs away.

name: Episode 9
description: Perrine and her mother encounter another traveling photographer. They head to the next town for work, but find they have competition there too.

name: Episode 10
description: When they ask customers to choose whose photos are better, the customers favor Marie. Their rival, angered, plans to steal their camera.

name: Episode 11
description: Marcel is slowly teaching Baron some tricks. When Baron returns with a bird in his mouth the next day, the Baron Puraga accuses them of being thieves.

name: Episode 12
description: The night they arrive in Milan, Marcel disappears. When Perrine and her mother worry about leaving without a farewell, he suddenly reappears.

name: Episode 13
description: Perrine‚Äôs group heads north from Milan to enter France through Switzerland. Before them are the towering peaks of the Alps, and the paths get steep.

name: Episode 14
description: Perrine tries to pick a flower for her mother and sprains her ankle. Marie rushes the carriage along to try to get Perrine to a doctor post haste.

name: Episode 15
description: Perrine and her mother only need to get through Geneva to reach France! Hearing they need police permission to work, they just head on for France.

name: Episode 16
description: Perrine and her mother reach France, but Marie is bedridden from illness. Perrine sets out alone to look for work in order to pay for their lodgings.

name: Episode 17
description: Once in Paris, Perrine and her mother run into Marcel. When Marcel hears Marie is traveling while ill, he tells them to visit his Grandpa Simon.

name: Episode 18
description: With her health worsening, Marie needs to stay in a hospital. Perrine sells the carriage and camera, but still can‚Äôt pay, so she lodges with Simon.

name: Episode 19
description: Perrine decides to sell Palikare to pay for her mother‚Äôs treatment. She is deeply grateful for shoemaker Gaston‚Äôs kind words and Marcel‚Äôs friendship.

name: Episode 20
description: Perrine heads to town with Simon to sell Palikare, but Palikare stops moving when they reach the market, leaving them in a bind.

name: Episode 21
description: Marie is now so ill that even the doctors can‚Äôt help. She tells Perrine to go on alone to find her grandfather, and to find happiness.

name: Episode 22
description: Perrine‚Äôs mother passes away. Perrine‚Äôs tears flow freely, but she heads to the station to take a train to Maraucourt as her mother‚Äôs will requests.

name: Episode 23
description: Perrine can only afford a ticket to La Chapelle, so she must alight and walk to Maraucourt. She marches forward on what will be a 5-day journey.

name: Episode 24
description: Perrine battles hunger and heat on her journey under the summer sun. Raindrops fall just as her water runs out, so she opens her mouth to the sky.

name: Episode 25
description: Perrine buys bread with the last of her money and is now penniless. The weather and her persistent hunger cause her to collapse with a high fever.

name: Episode 26
description: After collapsing from illness, Perrine pulls through with help from Grandma Lecri. She offers to travel with Perrine most of the way to Maraucourt.

name: Episode 27
description: Perrine finally arrives in Maraucourt! It is where her grandfather Vulfran lives, so she asks a girl she meets named Rosalie what he is like.

name: Episode 28
description: Vulfran appears harsh at first, but seems somewhat lonely. He‚Äôs also blind. Perrine, too scared to tell him who she is, uses another name.

name: Episode 29
description: Tired from her new job pushing carts, Perrine falls asleep by a pond. The next day, she finds an abanded cottage and decides to live there.

name: Episode 30
description: Perrine‚Äôs only pair of shoes wear through, but she can‚Äôt afford new ones. She decides to make some from cheap cloth, thread, and reeds near the pond.

name: Episode 31
description: Perrine makes what she needs from hand-me-downs and cheap materials. Rosalie is surprised by her skill. One day, Perrine invites Rosalie to lunch.

name: Episode 32
description: Perrine becomes the driver of a carriage for emergency patients and heads to Piquini. There, she runs into Palikare and Grandma Lecri again.

name: Episode 33
description: Vulfran‚Äôs nephew and senior factory manager Theodore realizes he‚Äôs lost his wallet. Perrine is ordered to examine every single worker.

name: Episode 34
description: As Perrine works hard pushing carts, she gets called in by the boss. He tells her to interpret for Vulfran, since she speaks English.

name: Episode 35
description: Vulfran orders Perrine to continue interpreting, and she is overjoyed to help her grandfather. Her day at work now begins reading English documents.

name: Episode 36
description: The English-speaking Fabry returns. It appears Perrine is out of a job, but Vulfran orders her to keep working by his side.

name: Episode 37
description: In her second month in Marucourt, Perrine receives unexpected news. Despite not knowing she‚Äôs his granddaughter, Vulfran makes her his secretary.

name: Episode 38
description: Rosalie is overjoyed that Perrine is now a secretary, and she searches for new lodgings. The two then go to buy new clothes befitting her role.

name: Episode 39
description: Vulfran gets a letter from India. The letter praises Edmond‚Äôs wife Marie, but Vulfran says he hates her.

name: Episode 40
description: Perrine is sad to hear her grandfather hates her mother. At the pond the next day, she overhears a secret conversation between Theodore and Talouel.

name: Episode 41
description: Vulfran prepares a telegram to India seeking news of his son Edmond. When he asks Perrine to send it, Talouel tries to make her show it to him.

name: Episode 42
description: Rosalie is sad at being apart from Perrine, who now lives with her grandfather. Rosalie waves at her on her way to work, but Perrine doesn‚Äôt see her.

name: Episode 43
description: Perrine goes to Rosalie‚Äôs home on Sunday, and they all go for a picnic. When Fabry asks Perrine about her background, she tells them everything.

name: Episode 44
description: Theodore‚Äôs mother, Vulfran‚Äôs sister Madame Bretonoux, comes to the mansion. She came to see Perrine, who has Vulfran‚Äôs trust, but what will she say?

name: Episode 45
description: Vulfran hears that Edmond is in Bosnia and waits anxiously for his return, making Perrine‚Äôs heart ache. One day, a report of his whereabouts arrives.

name: Episode 46
description: Vulfran‚Äôs grief over Edmond‚Äôs death is greater than Perrine had expected. A funeral is held the next day, but surprisingly few people attend.

name: Episode 47
description: Rosalie‚Äôs grandmother Francoise, Edmond‚Äôs former nanny, visits Vulfran, ill from grief and overwork. She says that Perrine looks like Edmond.

name: Episode 48
description: Vulfran begins thinking Aurelie is his granddaughter, and this cheers him enough to go back to work. A fire suddenly breaks out at a nearby daycare.

name: Episode 49
description: When Vulfran hears Perrine say that to be loved, one must first love, he starts to reconsider the lives of the people working in his factory.

name: Episode 50
description: The truth is finally revealed! Perrine can finally call her grandfather by name! Vulfran thanks God, and Perrine cries tears of joy.

name: Episode 51
description: A new life begins, and Perrine is happy to see her grandfather tackling the future of his factory. Meanwhile, he starts wishing to see her face.

name: Episode 52
description: Vulfran‚Äôs eye surgery is a success, and the bandages can come off at Christmas. On Christmas Day, Vulfran finally sees his long-lost granddaughter!

name: Episode 53
description: By spring, Vulfran has recovered much of his sight. With the daycare built and other projects underway, Vulfran and Perrine are sublimely happy.

name: Episode 1
description: In a postapocalyptic world, young Conan battles a shark in the underwater remains of a village. Then, a girl washes ashore in dire need of help.

name: Episode 2
description: Conan's early attempts to save Lana from her abductors meet with frustration, but a profound loss drives him to wholeheartedly commit to the pursuit.

name: Episode 3
description: Conan sails to an island where he makes a new friend. Together, they learn more about their enemies in Industria and hatch a daring plan.

name: Episode 4
description: Conan and Jimsy stow away aboard Capt. Dyce's ship, but their presence is soon discovered, and escape is no longer an option.

name: Episode 5
description: When the ship docks in Industria, Conan is jailed, while political opportunist Lepka interrogates Lana. Monsley tries to take Conan under her wing.

name: Episode 6
description: Conan and Lana attempt an escape in a wartime airplane, with Lepka in hot pursuit and threatening harm. Dyce and his crew get involved.

name: Episode 7
description: As Dyce's ship recedes into the fog, Lepka gathers his forces and weaponry, using the Falco to give chase. Conan sneaks aboard Lepka's vessel.

name: Episode 8
description: When Dyce and his crew are captured, Conan must depend on Lana to save his life and get them both to shore, where their next challenge awaits.

name: Episode 9
description: After crossing the desert, Conan and Lana infiltrate Industria as divers on a salvage mission, but their presence raises suspicion.

name: Episode 10
description: Terit prepares to report back to Lepka about Lana's meeting with her grandfather. Conan learns the true identity of his new friend as danger strikes.

name: Episode 11
description: While journeying back to Industria, Conan sets out to save Dyce and his crew. Lana and Lao go to the Triangle Tower, but Monsley informs on them.

name: Episode 12
description: As Lana and Lao hunt for the IC chip, Conan frees prisoners to help find Lao. When they all meet up in the Core Block, Lepka's soldiers are waiting.

name: Episode 13
description: When Lao heads back to Industria, Conan, Jimsy and Lana take the Barracuda to High Harbor, where they meet the village chief and are invited to stay.

name: Episode 14
description: In the village where Lana works, Conan and Jimsy meet the Barracuda crew and try to find jobs for themselves, but Jimsy goes a bit hog wild.

name: Episode 15
description: When masked riders attack Conan and Jimsy on the mountain, the boys are taken prisoner and try to negotiate a tenuous peace with Orlo.

name: Episode 16
description: Lana's weird premonitions lead Conan to the village where Jimsy works. Orlo offers to restore Dyce's ship, in exchange for slaying Conan and Jimsy.

name: Episode 17
description: While Conan and Jimsy assess the Industrian threat, Lana rallies the villagers against attack. The battle erupts as Orlo tries to seize control.

name: Episode 18
description: As Orlo takes over the island, Conan vows to save the captured Lana and the whole village. He devises a plan that has explosive implications.

name: Episode 19
description: Conan plots to undermine Industria's new plans for the Barracuda. Monsley takes a look backward. Fishy behavior alerts Lana to impending disaster.

name: Episode 20
description: Conan tries to persuade Monsley to fly his crew back to Industria, but when the Falco locates them, Conan and Monsley need to find a new plan.

name: Episode 21
description: When Conan's gang crash-lands in Industria, they learn of Lao's plight and the impending fate of the residents. Monsley faces a life-altering choice.

name: Episode 22
description: Conan tries to save Lana from a bomb, only to learn there are many others. He and his crew put their lives on the line to end Lepka's deadly madness.

name: Episode 23
description: Conan must face Lepka after he takes Lana hostage. With Lao, Conan's crew tries to activate the Solar Tower and learns the truth about the old world.

name: Episode 24
description: As Conan's crew sails away on the passenger ship, Lepka remains underground, plotting a new power grab that involves a huge warplane.

name: Episode 25
description: Conan, Jimsy and Dyce use the Giganto's own weaponry against it to disable the ship, but Lepka still has one more trick up his sleeve.

name: Episode 26
description: The passenger ship gathers Conan and his crew, and they head back to Remnant Island, a bit sadder and wiser, but with much to celebrate.
